rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0001
rows.name: I hear Chairman Bahn lost his position.

rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not surprising, given the dark rumors
about him, but...

rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I heard he was making something
outrageous in Superbia.

rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And he was trying to hand it
over to Iira, of all people...

rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0006
rows.name:
For now, Nilni-san is the acting chairman.
I wonder when the next one will be decided...

rows.label: tlk41300012_03_msg0007
rows.name:
It would be good if they decided quickly,
so it doesn't affect our business...
